mysql.buffer_pool.data_pages.description: The number of data pages in the InnoDB buffer pool.

mysql.buffer_pool.limit.description: The configured size of the InnoDB buffer pool.

mysql.buffer_pool.operations.description: The number of operations on the InnoDB buffer pool.

mysql.buffer_pool.page_flushes.description: The number of requests to flush pages from the InnoDB buffer pool.

mysql.buffer_pool.pages.description: The number of pages in the InnoDB buffer pool.

mysql.buffer_pool.usage.description: The number of bytes in the InnoDB buffer pool.

mysql.client.network.io.description: The number of transmitted bytes between server and clients.

mysql.commands.description: The number of times each type of command has been executed.

mysql.connection.count.description: The number of connection attempts (successful or not) to the MySQL server.

mysql.connection.errors.description: Errors that occur during the client connection process.

mysql.double_writes.description: The number of writes to the InnoDB doublewrite buffer.

mysql.handlers.description: The number of requests to various MySQL handlers.

mysql.index.io.wait.count.description: The total count of I/O wait events for an index.

mysql.index.io.wait.time.description: The total time of I/O wait events for an index.

mysql.joins.description: The number of joins that perform table scans.

mysql.log_operations.description: The number of InnoDB log operations.

mysql.max_used_connections.description: Maximum number of connections used simultaneously since the server started.

mysql.page_operations.description: The number of InnoDB page operations.

mysql.prepared_statements.description: The number of times each type of prepared statement command has been issued.

mysql.query.client.count.description: The number of statements executed by the server. This includes only statements sent to the server by clients.

mysql.query.count.description: The number of statements executed by the server.

mysql.row_locks.description: The number of InnoDB row locks.

mysql.row_operations.description: The number of InnoDB row operations.

mysql.statement_event.count.description: Summary of current and recent statement events.

mysql.statement_event.wait.time.description: The total wait time of the summarized timed events.

mysql.table.average_row_length.description: The average row length in bytes for a given table.

mysql.table.io.wait.count.description: The total count of I/O wait events for a table.

mysql.table.io.wait.time.description: The total time of I/O wait events for a table.

mysql.table.lock_wait.read.count.description: The total table lock wait read events.

mysql.table.lock_wait.read.time.description: The total table lock wait read events times.

mysql.table.lock_wait.write.count.description: The total table lock wait write events.

mysql.table.lock_wait.write.time.description: The total table lock wait write events times.

mysql.table.rows.description: The number of rows for a given table.

mysql.table.size.description: The table size in bytes for a given table.

mysql.table_open_cache.description: The number of hits, misses or overflows for open tables cache lookups.

mysql.tmp_resources.description: The number of created temporary resources.

mysql.uptime.description: The number of seconds that the server has been up.
